page.title: 01CLAWTON
page.content: {Clawton}is a friendly place.It is mostly a farming area.The farmland is mainly grassland.The Farmers keep {animals}like sheep and cows. The buildings are mostly quite old.Some of them are set down lanes. There is a{Holsworthy}Wood which consists of coniferous trees.There is also one garage owned by Mr.Budge. Although{Clawton}gets few tourists,there is a hotel called{Court {Barn}which would look after them.Court Barn is very cosy.The owner and his wife are very friendly. The nearest town is called {Holsworthy.Bus services}are very few in Clawton.So people rely on cars or by foot. The{River Claw}runs through Clawton.There is one cul de sac called {Claw Park}which is next to the Primary School.
